vendor_name: Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
title: Spain Asia-Inspired Coastal Mediterranean Escape with Guaranteed Room Upgrade & Daily Breakfast
description: Relish the restorative powers of Balinese-style relaxation thousands of miles away with a stay at the refreshing Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa, a Royal Hideaway Hotel in Alicante, Spain. The resort's tranquil botanic gardens contain over 3,000 species of lush flora imported from Southeast Asia and seven sparkling swimming pools, all just a ten-minute drive from the beach. Savour a fusion of Asian and Mediterranean cuisine at nine incredible onsite restaurants, or indulge in a rejuvenating ritual at the spa. Beyond the hotel, explore the charming Costa Blanca region, with its whitewashed homes and blue-domed churches, or venture to the bustling city of Alicante, famed for its historic castle and vibrant nightlife.
location_description: Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
offer_address: Rotonda Del Fuego, Terra Mitica, Finestrat, Alicante 03509, Spain

title: Mediterranean Beachfront Escape near Alicante with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: Immerse yourself in the effervescent spirit of Spain at the newly opened Barceló Benidorm Beach, a glorious retreat nestled in the pulsating heart of Benidorm. Savour Mediterranean flavours at the onsite La Santa María restaurant, or venture out to explore the bustling and historic Old Town. Beyond the city's charm, discover the breathtaking Algar Waterfalls and the captivating Guadalest Valley. Back at your opulent base, plunge into the serene rootop pool and ascend to the B-Heaven rooftop bar, where panoramic views of the skyline and glistening sea await.
offer_address: Avinguda Mare de Déu del Sofrat, Benidorm, Alacante, Spain

title: Mercure Benidorm Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Spain's Costa Blanca with a Mercure stay in the sparkling seaside town of Benidorm. When you're not lounging by the hotel's glittering pool or sipping cocktails at the Mediterranean-inspired bar, savour local flavours at Malaspina restaurant.

You won’t have to venture far from your room to embrace Benidorm's cool vibes and rich history either. You'll find a collection of bustling tapas bars, fine dining and upscale shopping, as well as the old town, right outside your door. Beyond the city's charm, discover the breathtaking Algar Waterfalls and the captivating Guadalest Valley.

vendor_name: Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
title: Costa Blanca Asia-Inspired Coastal Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Dinner & Guaranteed Room Upgrade,
description:
Relish the restorative powers of Southeast Asian relaxation at this Mediterranean retreat. Set within lush gardens, this five-star oasis boasts more than 3,000 plant species, seven sparkling swimming pools and indulgent Thai Spa treatments. Satisfy every craving with a culinary journey across nine dining options, from the Mediterranean-inspired Palapa Restaurant offering stunning pool views to the Udaipur buffet, where traditional flavours meet Asian flair.

Play a game of tennis on the onsite courts with sea views or relax on the beach volleyball court. Beyond the hotel, explore the charming Costa Blanca region with its whitewashed homes and blue-domed churches, or venture to the bustling city of Alicante, famed for its historic castle and vibrant nightlife.
location_description: Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
offer_address: Rotonda Del Fuego, Terra Mitica, Finestrat, Alicante 03509, Spain

title: Boutique Alicante Heritage Stay with Rooftop Bar & Panoramic Spa
description: Discover new heights of luxury among Alicante's historic streets with a five-star stay at Hospes Amérigo. This sophisticated oasis effortlessly blends avant-garde style with old-world charm for an escape that’s dripping in Mediterranean spirit. Whether it’s world-class treatments and panoramic vistas at Bodyna Spa or Iberico charcuterie and cocktails at the rooftop Amérigo Terrace, each reveals unforgettable views of Santa Barbara castle and the blue-domed churches beyond.
